alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lawrence County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Bedford to 12 miles northeast of Shoals. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Lawrence County, including the following locations... Silverville, Huron, Tunnelton, Williams, Spring Mill State Park and Mitchell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
